snippet: Republicans resist compromising their extreme positions and retreat further and further from the national mainstream.
abstract: Editorial argues the intransigence by House Republicans on immigration reform and farm bill demonstrate how little concern they have for country's prosperity and future of their own party; holds their refusal to negotiate is ultimately a refusal to govern.
lead_paragraph: Republicans resist compromising their extreme positions and retreat further and further from the national mainstream.

headline.main: In the House, a Refusal to Govern
headline.print_headline: In the House, a Refusal to Govern
